    • Constructor Detail

      • Buscript

        public Buscript(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Creates a new Buscript object, which is used to execute Javascript script files.

        This object is not thread-safe so a new one should be created for each thread.

        This constructor will automatically assign the variable name "plugin" to your plugin for script purposes.

        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin implementing this library.

      • Buscript

        public Buscript(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                String pluginScriptName)
        Creates a new Buscript object, which is used to execute Javascript script files.

        This object is not thread-safe so a new one should be created for each thread.

        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin implementing this library.
        pluginScriptName - The name of the variable the plugin will be referenced as in scripts.

      • scheduleScript

        public void scheduleScript(File scriptFile,
                           long delay)
        Schedules a script to be run at a later time as specified by delay with no specified target.
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - the file to execute.
        delay - the delay for the script in milliseconds.

      • scheduleScript

        public void scheduleScript(File scriptFile,
                           String target,
                           long delay)
        Schedules a script to be run at a later time as specified by delay with the specified target.
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - the file to execute.
        target - the target of the script which is used to replace the string '%t' and is added in the global scope as variable 'target'
        delay - the delay for the script in milliseconds.

      • clearScheduledScripts

        public void clearScheduledScripts(String target)
        This method will remove any scripts scheduled to be executed for the target. Null is a valid target.
        Parameters:
        target - The target to remove scheduled scripts for.

      • registerEventScript

        public void registerEventScript(String eventClassName,
                                String priorityString,
                                File scriptFile)
        Binds a script to a Bukkit event. The script will be run when the event fires with a "event" variable available in the script. The script file will be loaded into a cache for optimal performance.
        Parameters:
        eventClassName - The fully realized class name of the Bukkit event.
        priorityString - The priority for the event: LOWEST, LOW, NORMAL, HIGH, HIGHEST, MONITOR.
        scriptFile - The file containing the script.
